comments: Probably one of the most interesting professors at CUA. This guy is a total leader. He knows what he\'s talking about and doesn\'t waste time with tedious work. The class structure is set up to build experience with team building and working in teams, along with presenting. Students have the opportunity to develop comfortable presentation skills.
Yoest was the advisor for my internship and couldn\'t have been better. Always prompt with thorough responses, fair grader and always extremely interested in what I was doing. One of the best.

He was my consulting professor for my internship. He was incredibly helpful and quick to return feedback and grades for assignments. He put me into contact with a possible future employer and showed genuine interest in what my internship entailed. I hope I get the opportunity to take a class of his at school before I graduate.

Easy as long as you read the textbook. Hard grader on his case studies and gives no guidance on them so ask alot of questions about it because it is worth so much of you grade. Took him at Catholic University
Great teacher! very nice, has lots of experience in the field, knows what he is talking about. tests were pretty easy as long as you read the book. Book is mandatory.

Knows what he talks about...Looks like he has experience in the game, the short of teacher you want to have. Gives you a taste of what business is about. Took him at Catholic U, and the repetitive style that he has will make you learn what business is. and how to describe MGT in one word...lol (Over all good teacher, take him)

Not worth it! If you want an easy A without learning a thing, go ahead, take his class. If you actually want to learn something, run from this guy. Who knows what he is like at the other schools where he teaches, but he appears to be bored and puts no effort into teaching this course. If you\'re really interested in business, find a better teacher.

This was one of the best classes I have had since going to school at NOVA. Yes it is pretty easy but this does not mean you don\'t have to do the work, don\'t let him fool you or don\'t you try to fool him you have to do the work and yes does he try to help you get a A, yes but please don\'t try to use him. He knows what he is doing and he enjoys it.

Unique Professor. He keeps your attention in class even if you are there for 3 hours. Outstanding, excellent and enthousiastic Professor.I was very happy and lucky to be one of his student. Very clear and big knowledge. I hope I can take more classes with him. I trecommned him for you all.

If you want to actually learn how to apply things you learn to your workplace, then this is the man for you! I really can\'t say enough about this professor. I have over 100 semester hours and he is the best professor I have ever had, by far. Do yourself a favor and take him for every class you can!
This is an easy class. The use of the book on a regular basis will give you a A. It is a good class for students who want an insight into the Business world, very practical class.
The class is very easy. In my opinion, this would be a good online class. Overall, an easy A. But if you want to learn a lot in this class, take another professor.

He is an awesome teacher!! He is really understanding and cool. Class was a breeze. Just TRY to at least look through the book when there is a quiz (every day). The quizzes, if you show effort is a free A. Have fun and take Yoest!
Great proffessor , very understanding instead of shutting you down he will make up things for you to succeed , easy class he will keep your attention the whole class without you noticing.
Keeps the students sucked into his world!hes a great professor
Keeps the students sucked into his world!
Prof. Yoest is a great instructor who takes the class beyond the text into where we are in the workplace right now.
He is an excellent teacher. he makes his class very interesting and I really learned a lot.
Great teacher, took the class purely because he was teaching. Always keeps the class interesting and real, not cookie cutter at all...Great teacher.
always kept me engaged had fun in class
